NASA's Fermi Mission Creates 14-Year Time-Lapse of the Gamma-Ray Sky
The cosmos comes alive in an all-sky time-lapse movie made from 14 years of data acquired by NASA's Fermi Gamma-ray…

Image Of The Day
Making Fire Sense on Monroe Mountain
A high-intensity prescribed burn in south-central Utah will help restore the region's aspen trees. It could also improve the lives of people managing, fighting, and living with fire.Flames burn orange through green conifers and golden aspen on the slopes of Monroe Mountain in Utah's Fishlake National Forest, sending gray and brown smoke billowing into the sky in this image from Oct. 9, 2023.
